amendment.description: To amend the DC Student Opportunity Scholarship Program regarding student assessments.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1787 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1787 proposed by Senator Feinstein to Amendment SA 1783. (consideration: CR S11944-11957) To amend the DC Student Opportunity Scholarship Program regarding student assessments.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1787 proposed by Senator Feinstein to Amendment SA 1783.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1787 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
